entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Parameters from body or forms should not be generated as OpenApiParameters #42483
  • Set description for OpenApiResponse #42482
  • Authentication/Authorization API changes for preview.7 #42481
    7.0-preview7
  • Howto call Azure AD B2C Change Password profile from Blazor WASM #42479
  • Clean up output spew when creating token and secret for the first time #42474
    7.0-preview7
  • Set OpenApiSecurityRequirement for local JWT bearer-based scenarios #42473
    7.0-preview7
  • ClientAssets package beta not behaving as expected #42472
  • Change status code 200 to 204 for DefaultApiConventions.Delete #42468
  • Add status code attribute 409 Conflict to DefaultApiConventions.Post #42467
  • CORS setting in asp.net core 6.0 is not restricting the origins #42463
  • API stop working in ASP core 6 after adding new ConsumesAttribute("application/json") angular project #42462
  • SignalR Client connection is very slow when adding kestrel section to appsettings.json file and setting https or http url. #42461

Closed

  • Add `blazorwasm` Template Baseline Tests #42267
    7.0-preview7
  • Virtualize should allow customization of the spacer element type #42206
    7.0-preview7
  • Root-level virtualization incompatible with overflow-y:scroll on html/body elements #37659
    7.0-preview7
  • Move OpenAPI extension methods to M.A.Builder namespace #42445
    7.0-preview7
  • Set `DefaultScheme` in configuration from user-jwts tool #42453
    7.0-preview6
  • Fix reading scheme-specific options from config #42454
    7.0-preview6
  • Better error for "Attempting to return wrong pooled instance" #42433
  • Blazor app is not working with custom extension in URL @page #42436
  • Change DefaultFiles/DirectoryBrowser/StaticFileMiddleware to only no-op if there's an active endpoint with a non-null RequestDelegate #42413
    7.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Add File Id to IBrowserFile Interface #42480
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] Fix newtonsoft alerts #42478
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.8
  • Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42477
    area-infrastructure
  • Cleanup CommonLibTests.vcxproj #42476
    area-runtime
  • Change QUIC transport to use multiple calls to QuicStream.WriteAsync #42464
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Implement analyzer to favor using builder.Logging over ConfigureLogging #42354
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • Specify the current agent demands and VS version #42460
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • [release/7.0-preview6] Fix up reading auth schemes and setting default scheme #42470
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts
  • Add `blazorwasm` Template Baseline Tests #42420
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview7
  • Fix logging conditions for additional request headers #42456
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview7
  • Updated VS workload manifests to Windows SDK 19041 #42457
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • Virtualization enhancements #42446
    area-blazor, api-suggestion, 7.0-preview7
  • Move OpenAPI extension methods to M.A.Builder namespace #42469
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview7
  • Fix up reading auth schemes and setting default scheme #42452
    7.0-preview7
  • Allow file middlewares to run if there's an endpoint with a null request delegate #42458
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • [release/7.0-preview6] Backport custom HTML elements rendering Blazor components #42383
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor

Updated

  • Implement analyzer that suggests using builder.Services to ConfigureServices method #42356
    area-infrastructure
  • Implementing analyzer to prefer WebApplicationBuilder.Configuration over Configure methods #42351
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update MouseEventArgs to include MovementX, MovementY #42451
    area-blazor
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
    area-runtime
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
    area-web-frameworks
  • Introducing `I*HttpResult` interfaces #42385
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add AuthorizationBuilder #42264
    area-security
  • Add message type resolver #42428
    area-grpc
